issues.title: PAT module fails
notes: Fixed: MODULE_DIR was missing 'ko4dfo-user-modules/' in path

issues.title: User modules take 2+ minutes to install
notes: Fixed: CLAUDE-CODE module now skips npm install if already installed
Fixed: Cached 394 nodejs/npm .deb packages in packages/apt/, using dpkg instead of apt-get

issues.title: Theme not sticking (currently Mint-Y-Grey)
notes: Fixed: Updated theme.conf with Mint-Y-Dark-Teal, simplified module to use gsettings directly

issues.title: Claude Code VSCodium extension disappears after reboot
notes: Fixed: VSCODIUM module now symlinks ~/.vscode-oss/extensions to persistent storage

issues.title: Claude Code acts as if run for first time (color scheme, authenticate)
notes: Fixed: CLAUDE-CODE module now symlinks ~/.claude (not ~/.config/claude-code) to persistent storage
